parameter.name: creditnoteEmailTemplateId
parameter.description: Default credit note email template id used for this contact while sending credit notes.

parameter.name: estimateEmailTemplateId
parameter.description: Default estimate email template id used for this contact while sending estimates.

parameter.name: invoiceEmailTemplateId
parameter.description: Default invoice email template id used for this contact while sending invoices.

parameter.name: creditnoteTemplateId
parameter.description: Default credit note template id used for this contact while creating credit note.

parameter.name: estimateTemplateId
parameter.description: Default estimate template id used for this contact while creating estimate.

parameter.name: invoiceTemplateId
parameter.description: Default invoice template id used for this contact while creating invoice.

parameter.name: vatRegNo
parameter.description: VAT Registration number of a contact with VAT treatment as eu_vat_registered.

parameter.name: countryCode
parameter.description: For UK Edition: Two letter country code of a contact with VAT treatment as eu_vat_registered. For Avalara: Two letter country code for the customer country, if your customer is not in US.

parameter.name: avataxUseCode
parameter.description: Used to group like customers for exemption purposes. It is a custom value that links customers to a tax rule. Select from Avalara standard codes or enter a custom code.

parameter.name: taxExemptionId
parameter.description: ID of the tax exemption (US Edition only).

parameter.name: vatTreatment
parameter.description: VAT treatment of the contact. Allowed Values: uk, eu_vat_not_registered, eu_vat_registered and non_eu (UK Edition only).

parameter.name: avataxExemptNo
parameter.description: Exemption certificate number of the customer (Avalara integration only).

parameter.name: taxAuthorityId
parameter.description: ID of the tax authority. Tax authority depends on the location of the customer. For example, if the customer is located in NY, then the tax authority is NY tax authority (US Edition only).

parameter.name: taxId
parameter.description: ID of the tax or tax group that can be collected from the contact. Tax can be given only if is_taxable is true (US Edition only).

parameter.name: taxIdValue
parameter.description: Tax ID of the contact. (This node is only available when the organization's country is U.S.A)

parameter.name: taxIdType
parameter.description: Tax ID type of the contact, it can be SSN, ATIN, ITIN or EIN. (This node is only available when the organization's country is U.S.A)

parameter.name: track1099
parameter.description: Boolean to track a contact for 1099 reporting. (This node is only available when the organization's country is U.S.A)

parameter.name: isPrimaryContact
parameter.description: To mark contact person as primary for contact. Allowed value is true only.

parameter.name: email
parameter.description: Email address of the contact person.

parameter.name: contactPersons
parameter.description: Contact persons of a contact.

parameter.name: shippingAddress
parameter.description: Shipping address of the contact.

parameter.name: billingAddress
parameter.description: Billing address of the contact.

parameter.name: customFields
parameter.description: Custom fields of the contact.

parameter.name: website
parameter.description: Website of the contact.

parameter.name: companyName
parameter.description: Company Name of the contact.

parameter.name: contactName
parameter.description: Display Name of the contact.

parameter.name: isTaxable
parameter.description: Boolean to track the taxability of the customer (US Edition only).

parameter.name: defaultTemplates
parameter.description: Default templates for the Contact.

parameter.name: paymentTerms
parameter.description: Payment terms for a contact.

parameter.name: paymentTermsLabel
parameter.description: Payment terms label for a contact.

parameter.name: currencyId
parameter.description: Currency Id of a contact.

parameter.name: notes
parameter.description: Notes to be added to the Contact.
